label: SplitButton
description: SplitButton groups a set of commands in an overlay with a default command.

methods.label: Methods
methods.description: Defines methods that can be accessed by the component's reference.

values.name: getElement
values.description: Used to get container element.

values.name: hide
values.description: Used to hide the popup.

values.name: show
values.description: Used to show the popup.

props.label: SplitButtonProps
props.description: Defines valid properties in SplitButton component. In addition to these, all properties of HTMLDivElement can be used in this component.

values.name: buttonClass
values.description: ClassName of the button.

values.name: buttonProps
values.description: Props for the main button, any prop is passed implicity to the button element.

values.name: disabled
values.description: When present, it specifies that the component should be disabled.

values.name: dropdownIcon
values.description: Name of the dropdown icon or JSX.Element for dropdown icon.

values.name: icon
values.description: Name of the icon.

values.name: label
values.description: Text of the button.

values.name: loading
values.description: Display loading icon of the button

values.name: loadingIcon
values.description: Name of the loading icon or JSX.Element for loading icon.

values.name: menuButtonClass
values.description: ClassName of the menu dropdown button.

values.name: menuButtonProps
values.description: Props for the dropdown button, any prop is passed implicity to the dropdown button element.

values.name: menuClass
values.description: ClassName class of the overlay menu.

values.name: menuStyle
values.description: Inline style of the overlay menu.

values.name: model
values.description: MenuModel instance to define the overlay items.

values.name: outlined
values.description: Add a border class without a background initially.

values.name: pt
values.description: Uses to pass attributes to DOM elements inside the component.

values.name: ptOptions
values.description: Used to configure passthrough(pt) options of the component.

values.name: raised
values.description: Add a shadow to indicate elevation.

values.name: rounded
values.description: Add a circular border radius to the button.

values.name: severity
values.description: Defines the style of the button, valid values are "secondary", "success", "info", "warning", "danger", "contrast".

values.name: size
values.description: Defines the size of the button, valid values are "small" and "large".

values.name: text
values.description: Add a textual class to the button without a background initially.

values.name: tooltip
values.description: Content of the tooltip.

values.name: tooltipOptions
values.description: Configuration of the tooltip, refer to the tooltip documentation for more information.

values.name: transitionOptions
values.description: The properties of CSSTransition can be customized, except for "nodeRef" and "in" properties.

values.name: unstyled
values.description: When enabled, it removes component related styles in the core.

values.name: visible
values.description: When present, it specifies that the element should be visible.

callbacks.label: Callbacks
callbacks.description: Defines callbacks that determine the behavior of the component based on a given condition or report the actions that the component takes.

values.name: onClick
values.description: Callback to invoke when main button is clicked.

values.name: onHide
values.description: Callback to invoke when overlay panel becomes hidden.

values.name: onShow
values.description: Callback to invoke when overlay panel becomes visible.

values.name: root
values.description: Uses to pass attributes to the root's DOM element.

values.name: icon
values.description: Uses to pass attributes to the icon's DOM element.

values.name: button
values.description: Uses to pass attributes to the Button component.

values.name: menuButton
values.description: Uses to pass attributes to the Button component.

values.name: menu
values.description: Uses to pass attributes to the menu's DOM element.

values.name: menuList
values.description: Uses to pass attributes to the menu list's DOM element.

values.name: separator
values.description: Uses to pass attributes to the separator's DOM element.

values.name: menuIcon
values.description: Uses to pass attributes to the menu icon's DOM element.

values.name: menuLabel
values.description: Uses to pass attributes to the menu label's DOM element.

values.name: anchor
values.description: Uses to pass attributes to the anchor's DOM element.

values.name: menuItem
values.description: Uses to pass attributes to the menu item's DOM element.

values.name: tooltip
values.description: Uses to pass attributes tooltip's DOM element.

values.name: hooks
values.description: Used to manage all lifecycle hooks

values.name: transition
values.description: Used to control React Transition API.

types.label: Props types
types.description: Defines types used by properties of the SplitButton component.

state.description: Defines current inline state in SplitButton component.

values.name: id
values.description: Current id state as a boolean.

values.name: overlayVisible
values.description: Current overlay visible state as a boolean.
